# I have successfully moved to the new position at (x=-15.0, y=24.0).
# 
# This should place me within the valid range for placing the stone furnace. I will now attempt to place it again at this location.

place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=Position(x=-15.0, y=24.0))  # Placing the stone furnace at this location.
